Shiny is a package that makes it easy to create interactive web apps using R and <a href="https://shypy-test-center.netlify.app/py/" target="_blank">Python</a>. It's hard to believe, but this past summer Shiny turned 10! At rstudio::conf 2022, I shared some stories about its creation, the conditions that have made it a success over the years, and our plans for the near future.
